author: cbs8
title: Keeping An Eye Out for Patio Sites, Inc. in the News!
text:
Check out the article written by The SandPaper featuring LBI Bars & Grills and their use of weather resistant materials with Patio Sites, Inc.'s Steele brand grills.
 SAN FRANCISCO, CA, October 08, LBI Bars & Grills is setting a trend with a new style of portable outdoor kitchens made with marine-grade fiberglass featuring the use of Steele Gas Grills and Outdoor Kitchen Products by Patio Sites Inc.
Patio Sites, Inc. founded in 2012, is a company specializing in high-end stainless steel barbeque grills and outdoor patio furniture and accessories. Based in California's Bay Area, they have a strong online presence and are able to ship to customers anywhere in the nation.
More recently, The SandPaper , a New Jersey based publication, featured LBI Bars & Grills for their very innovative style of outdoor portable entertaining-ready kitchens. LBI Bars & Grills, also based in New Jersey, has a Patent Pending design that comes with a lifetime guarantee on their product.
It is easy to see why they would pair their affordable, virtually indestructible (by the elements) outdoor kitchen space with the well-made luxury of Steele Gas Grills. Steele's tagline, "Nothing is stronger than a Steele," is fitting. Steele products include 2 grill sizing options, refrigerators, storage, side burners, sinks, and more.
Their built in grills start at $1,199 and offer a wide variety of options to fit any custom kitchen's needs. The 24" outdoor refrigerator is great for keeping the drinks cold and the party going for an additional $1,099. For the same price as the refrigerator, you can include a 30" beverage center complete with a sink, condiment tray, bottle opener, towel holder, and an ice chest with a sliding lid, sure to make you the king, or queen, of grilling and entertaining.
Do you have a Steele product that you love to use? Have a great grilling experience to share with us? Send them to contact@patiosites.com or post them to the Patio Sites, Inc. Facebook page!
For more info on LBI Bars & Grills, visit their web page: http://www.lbioutdoorkitchen.com/
For more info on Patio Sites, Inc. and their featured products, visit their website: http://www.wholesalepatiostore.com/
Patio Sites, Inc. on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PatioSitesInc/
To purchase Steele Gas Grills and their other products, follow this link: http://www.wholesalepatiostore.com/Steele/
Wholesale Patio Store exists because of the wonderful team we have. Between us we have tremendous experience, skill, and capability; together, we make Wholesale Patio Store the best choice for absolutely everything your patio needs.
